power.title: Arcane Bolt
power.fluff: An arrow of force appears next to you, waiting for your gesture that will send it on an unerring path toward an enemy

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes force damage equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. If the target is within 10 squares, the damage increases by +3. If the target is within 5 squares, the damage increases by an additional +3.

power.title: Blissful Ignorance
power.fluff: A tangle of soothing magic distracts your enemies, leaving them vulnerable as they chase after pleasant dreams

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target is distracted until the end of your next turn.
While distracted, each target is slowed and can't take opportunity actions or immediate actions.

If you use this power outside of combat, each target also takes a -5 penalty to Perception, and creatures a target was not aware of can sneak through a target's field of vision as though it had concealment.
If a target was not aware of you when you use this power, it is not aware of being affected.

power.title: Call the Night Winds
power.fluff: Howling night winds spiral around you before striking to chill all in their way

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The blast creates a zone of howling winds that lasts until the end of your next turn.
The zone is heavily obscured to creatures other than you, and any enemy that starts its turn in the zone is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Chill Claws
power.fluff: Skeletal hands appear around your targets, ripping into them with icy claws and sapping their will to fight

section.name: Target:
section.text: One or two creatures

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure skeletal claws in each target's space until the end of your next turn. The claws move with the target, remaining in its space.
While the claws occupy the target's space, it takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

power.title: Cinderfall
power.fluff: A thousand motes of fire momentarily linger in the air before streaking toward a single foe that has managed to avoid them

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: One target you missed in the burst takes fire damage equal to your Consitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. For each additional target you missed, you deal an additional +1 fire damage.

power.title: Color Spray
power.fluff: A brilliant blast of flashing colors springs from your outstretched fingers, knocking nearby enemies senseless

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier radiant damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Radiant damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.
